net.proteusframework.data.filesystem

Class DataSourceStreamManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.i2rd.datastore.jdbc.AbstractStreamManager
      • net.proteusframework.data.filesystem.DataSourceStreamManager

  • @Component
public class DataSourceStreamManager
extends com.i2rd.datastore.jdbc.AbstractStreamManager
    AbstractStreamManager implementation that gets connections from a DataSource.
    Author:
    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)
